name: Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
desc:
Thunder in the Mist: Electro Cicin Mage

...Just as the scent of Mist Grass intoxicates the Electro Cicins, so too does the sadistic mage hanker after the pleasure of toying with her foe...

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 1 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> , applies <color=#ffacff>Electro Application</color> to this character, creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Electro Cicin Shield</color> and prepares <color=#ffffff>Surging Thunder</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Electro Cicin Shield</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
Provides <color=#ffffff>1 Shield point</color> for your active character.
<color=#ffffff>When created:</color> If you have <color=#ffffff>Electro Cicin</color> on the field, additionally increase <color=#ffffff>Shield</color> by the amount of <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> it has. (Adds a maximum of 3 additional <color=#ffffff>Shield</color> )
<color=#ece5d8>Surging Thunder</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color>
<color=#ffffff>After your opponent plays a total of 3 Action Cards:</color> This card gains 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> . (Max 3 stacks)
<color=#ffffff>After Fatui Electro Cicin Mage takes Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> This card loses 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> .

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Shield</color>
This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
<color=#ffacff>Electro Application</color>
When Electro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reactions triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : The target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : No effect
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : No effect
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : Creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

value.name: Electro Cicin's Gleam
value.desc:
Electro Cicin Mage: Electro Cicin's Gleam

"Are you... here to play with me?"

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Electro Cicin Mage

value.name: Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
value.desc:
A Fatui mage who can command Electro Cicins in battle. Their origins and what they look like under that mask are both mysteries.
Similarly to the way that Electro Cicins go crazy for Mist Grass, Cicin Mages take great pleasure in toying with their prey.

customize.name: Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
Thunder in the Mist: Electro Cicin Mage

...Just as the scent of Mist Grass intoxicates the Electro Cicins, so too does the sadistic mage hanker after the pleasure of toying with her foe...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Electro Cicin Mage's Improv Song

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "According to my friends, an Electro Cicin Mage will sing all kinds of lovely songs when they are relaxing. It seems that most of these are made up on the spot..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Electro Cicin Mage" starts with the Talent Card "Electro Cicin's Gleam" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Electro Cicin Mage's Memorial Ceremony

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Of course, if Electro Cicin Mages still have the time and energy to spare after engaging a worthy foe, they might also do a special dance to commemorate that battle."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Electro Cicin Mage" starts with the Talent Card "Electro Cicin's Gleam" equipped, and "Pyro Agent" starts with the Talent Card "Paid in Full" equipped.</color>
